query: SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(DISTINCT pc.productId) as productCount FROM categories c LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId WHERE c.slug = 'filtration' GROUP BY c.id, c.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(DISTINCT pc.productId) as productCount FROM categories c LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId WHERE c.slug = 'filtration' GROUP BY c.id, c.name;
